column7: was found dead in a guesthouse in Kampot.------The guesthouse owner said the victim had been staying at the guesthouse for around a month. He apparently suffered from seizures regularly and had received help from staff.------Mr. Sok Sakan
column8: director of the technical department of Kampot police station
column9: confirmed that the post mortem examination stated that the victim died of a heart attack at about 4 am
